title: In case of the case building, the list of occupants and area occupied by each of them in the old building shall be certified by MHADA and for other building it shall also be certified by MHADA
clause_text: In case of the case building, the list of occupants and area occupied by each of them in the old building shall be certified by MHADA and for other building it shall also be certified by MHADA.
